pageContext.claim: “[Tester]'s always going to stay with Schumer and Pelosi, always.”
pageContext.analysis: Tester has voted with Trump 36.8 percent of the time, according to FiveThirtyEight. He has voted to confirm several of the president’s Cabinet officials and has supported major pieces of legislation Trump supported including a rollback of some Dodd-Frank regulations and expanding private care options for veterans. Sen. Charles E. Schumer (D-N.Y.), by contrast, has voted with Trump 25 percent of time while Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.0 voted with Trump 20 percent.
